News.headline: Don't Miss Out On The Daggers Christmas Hospitality Special
News.page_title: Don't Miss Out On The Daggers Christmas Hospitality Special
News.URL_keywords: Don't Miss Out On The Daggers Christmas Hospitality Special
News.short_description: The deadline to book for our Christmas Hospitality Special is tomorrow at 10am, so book now!
News.description:
On Saturday 17th December we will be hosting Solihull Moors at The Chigwell Construction Stadium for our last game before Christmas, here at the Daggers we are offering a special for fans wanting to dine and watch the game in style.

A massive saving is on offer for this Vanarama National League fixture with Hospitality tickets reduced to just £45.00 per person and £25.00 per person for season ticket holders (usually £65.00).

The matchday hospitality package includes the following:

·Three course carvery meal
·Complimentary match day programme and team sheet
·Half time refreshments
·Seat in the sponsors box

The game kicks off at 3.00pm with lunch served from 1pm.

For more information or to make a booking please contact the clubs commercial department on commercial@daggers.co.uk or call 0208 592 1549 Ext. 33.

Please note that last orders for the hospitality will be at Tomorrow at 10am.
